description: This file defines a multi-language team with language-specific agents, including their configuration, and demonstrates usage by printing responses to sample questions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents a language-specific agent with configuration for model and instructions.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles memory storage for the team, backed by a database.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Database interface for storing memories in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: Model class for Mistral-based chat models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Storage class for team sessions backed by PostgreSQL.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with configuration and methods for interaction.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response from the team for a given prompt, with streaming enabled.
